data.title: Brooks School: Coeducational Private School in North Andover, MA
data.meta_description: Alumni Board - Brooks School provides a co-educational, college preparatory program for 370 students in grades 9 through 12.
data.text:
The Brooks School Alumni Board is a group of dedicated alumni who collectively aim to bolster the ongoing relationship between the school and its alumni base. Sally Milliken '88, P'22, P'24 has been the president since 2020 and, along with the committee chairs, is excited to build upon their past successes and engage alumni in meaningful and exciting ways.

The board is always interested in hearing from alumni about potential projects and board members. If you have an idea, or are interested in joining the Alumni Board, contact alumni@brooksschool.org. If you would like to nominate yourself or a fellow alum for the Alumni Board, please complete our form by clicking the button below.

Alumni Board Nomination Form

Want to know more about the Alumni Board? We've answered some frequently asked questions:
